## DynamicCommandLineAction class

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DynamicCommandLineAction extends CommandLineAction
```

For example, if the tool is called "example", then the "build" action might be invoked as: "example build -q --some-other-option"</p><p>(Inherited from [CommandLineAction](./ts-command-line.commandlineaction.md) )</p>                                                                                                              |

| [summary](./ts-command-line.commandlineaction.summary.md)                                    | <code>readonly</code> | string                                                                                  | <p>A quick summary that is shown on the main help page, which is displayed by the command "example --help"</p><p>(Inherited from [CommandLineAction](./ts-command-line.commandlineaction.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                                                |

| [defineChoiceListParameter(definition)](./ts-command-line.commandlineparameterprovider.definechoicelistparameter.md)                    |                        | <p>Defines a command-line parameter whose value must be a string from a fixed set of allowable choices (similar to an enum).
